com.davesartory.launchpad

Interface LpButton

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ButtonImpl, LpPad, LpVirtualButton

    public interface LpButton
    Common functionality of LpButtons

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addButtonListener(ButtonListener buttonListener)
      Add a ButtonListener to this button.
      LpButtonTypes getButtonType()
      Get the button type (grid button or specific control button)
      LpColor getColor()
      Get the current color value of the button
      int getMidiNote()
      Get the midi note integer value for the button
      String getName()
      Get the name of this button
      void lightOff()
      Turn off a button light.
      void lightOn()
      Turn on button light at current value or default white
      void lightOn(int colorMidiValue)
      Turn on button light using integer color value (1-127) 0 is black/off
      void lightOn(LpColor c)
      sets the color of the button and lights it
      void lightOn(LpColor color, LpBrightness brightness)
      Sets color plus offset for brightness and lights button
      void lightOn(LpColor color, LpBrightness brightness, LpStyle style)
      Sets color plus offset for brightness and lights button in chosen style SOLID, FLASH, PULSING
      void removeButtonListener()
      Remove the button listener from this button
      void setColor(LpColor c)
      Set the current color of the button
